alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:12PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Greene County through 445 PM CDT... At 412 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Willard, or 8 miles northwest of Springfield, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Springfield, Willard, Ash Grove, Walnut Grove, Brookline, Sacville, Glidewell, Cave Springs and Ebenezer. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 70 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
